thread.title: You'll want this 'Hamilton' lullaby right now -- um, for your kids
thread.title_full: You'll want this 'Hamilton' lullaby right now -- um, for your kids

author: Proma Khosla
title: You'll want this 'Hamilton' lullaby right now -- um, for your kids
text:
It's been a few months since the Hamilton mixtape, did you think the smash musical had fizzled out? Apart from ongoing sold-out performances in New York and Chicago, Hamilton is getting a new cover — this time by Rockabye Baby , with several of the songs rendered as lullabies.
SEE ALSO: For International Women's Day, 'Hamilton' cast donated salaries from last night's show
The full album will release March 31 and contain eight Hamilton songs for the casual infant listener. Rockabye Baby recently released lullaby renditions of Beyoncé songs, including "Naughty Girl" and "Hold Up."
The full track list for Lullaby Renditions of Songs from Hamilton is as follows:
Alexander Hamilton
My Shot
The Schuyler Sisters
You’ll Be Back
Helpless
Satisfied
Wait for It
Say No to This
WATCH: 50 points for Gryffindor: Emma Watson drops a beat for Lin-Manuel Miranda's freestyle
